"Electric Toothbrush with Smart Timer and Feedback" - An electric toothbrush with a built-in timer and feedback mechanism that alerts the user when they have been brushing for the recommended two minutes and when they need to adjust their technique to improve their oral hygiene.

"Electric Toothbrush with UV Sensors" - An electric toothbrush with UV sensors that can detect plaque and stains in hard-to-reach areas of the mouth, such as between the teeth and under the gum line, and provide real-time feedback to the user.

"Electric Toothbrush with AI-Powered Brushing Modes" - An electric toothbrush with AI-powered brushing modes that can be customized to the user's specific needs and preferences, such as sensitive teeth, gum care, or whitening.

"Electric Toothbrush with Built-in Oral Health Tracker" - An electric toothbrush with a built-in oral health tracker that monitors the user's brushing habits and provides personalized recommendations for improving their oral hygiene routine.

"Electric Toothbrush with Interactive Brushing Games" - An electric toothbrush with interactive brushing games that make brushing fun and engaging for children and adults alike, while also promoting good oral hygiene habits.
